name: Nepali Calendar
author: ThemeEgg

sections.description:
This is a simple Nepali calender plugin plus calender widget.

Shortcode of this plugin

  • [nepali-calendar]

Please visit our official page http://docs.themeegg.com/docs/nepali-calendar/ for more information.

Get free support at http://support.themeegg.com

Requirements

  • WordPress 4.5 or later.

Contribute

You can contribute to the source code in our GitHub page.

Features

  1. Simple nepali calendar widget and shortcode
sections.installation:
1. Download the plugin and extract the files
  2. Upload “nepali-calendar” to your wp-
    content/plugins/directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Put shortcode to anywhere.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download the plugin and extract the files
  2. Upload “nepali-calendar” to your wp-
    content/plugins/directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Put shortcode to anywhere.

How many argument accepts by this shortcode plugin?

Please visit our official twitter api master page(http://doc.themeegg.com/plugins/nepali-calendar) for more details. You can find there more details about this plugin.
